definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="speed">speed</variable><variable type="Number" id="Yaw">Yaw</variable><variable type="Number" id="MoveX">MoveX</variable><variable type="Number" id="MoveZ">MoveZ</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Makes it fly and accelerate when pressed on W</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="logic_entity_compare"><field name="entity">CUSTOM:Manta</field><value name="compareTo"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="entity_isbeingridden"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_nbt_logic_get"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Montado</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:speed</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.8</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:Yaw</field><value name="VAL"><block type="entity_direction"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:MoveX</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MULTIPLY</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:speed</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_singular_ops"><field name="OP">COS</field><value name="NUM"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MULTIPLY</field><value name="A"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="NUM">180</field></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:MoveZ</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MULTIPLY</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:speed</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_singular_ops"><field name="OP">SIN</field><value name="NUM"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MULTIPLY</field><value name="A"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:Yaw</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">90</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="NUM">180</field></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></value><next><block type="entity_set_movement" inline="false"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Move up and down when flying</comment><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="vx"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" name="A"><block type="entity_pitch"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">-0.03</field></block></value></block></value><value name="vz"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:MoveZ</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Makes it stop in the air when you release W</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_isbeingridden"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="entity_nbt_logic_get"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Montado</field></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:speed</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_set_movement"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Move para cima e baixo quando estiver parado.</comment><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="vx"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="vy"><block type="entity_nbt_num_get"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">MoveY</field></block></value></block></value><value name="vz"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></statement><next><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">If I didn't have anyone set it up, it will fall... so when you accidentally press SHIFT</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="logic_entity_compare"><field name="entity">CUSTOM:Manta</field><value name="compareTo"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="entity_set_movement"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="vx"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="vy"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">-0.3</field></block></value><value name="vz"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
